While not strictly about Cantera, this may be of interest to some in 
this group:


POSTDOCTORAL POSITION

Applications are being sought for a postdoctoral position at Caltech
in the area of fuel cell modeling and simulation. The successful
applicant will participate in two funded, multidisciplinary team
research programs - one focused on developing a micropower generator,
and the other on fundamental studies of direct electrochemical
oxidation of hydrocarbons. A major component of the work will be
developing multiphysics numerical models of fuel cell components and
systems, ranging from models for elementary surface chemistry and
transport phenomena, to dynamic system models. Experience with fuel
cells or related fields is desirable, as is proficiency in
object-oriented software design.

For more information or to apply, contact Professor David G. Goodwin
at Caltech (dgoodwin@...).
